item.title: About | Contact
item.description:
About | Contact

Bio, press and contact information for composer Ted Regklis

item.title: The departure
item.description:
The departure

"The departure" was developed by decoystudios with the collaboration of Tony Zagoraios for Pause festival in Australia. The brief was to create a short visual account for the festivals 2012 theme "Future" CAST MARIA MILIOPOULOU DIMITRIS KAMINARIS EXECUTIVE PRODUCER: NIKITAS RAFAIL PROD.

item.title: Making of "TEDxAthens 2011"
item.description:
Making of "TEDxAthens 2011"

In 2011 I was called to produce and direct the videos of TEDx Atnens, one of the biggest annual events taking place in the city of Athens. After 3 months of hard work we finally delivered 32 videos. That's how we did it!
